summary: This document is an email chain from February 2020 between a client and their attorney, Sigrid McCawley. The client expresses frustration with their legal representation and the FBI, stating they wish to file an official complaint against the FBI for lack of response and perceived unfair treatment. McCawley attempts to coordinate with a colleague, David, who is handling Epstein estate matters in the US Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, Attorney
persons.context: The attorney communicating with a frustrated client who wishes to file a complaint against the FBI. She is trying to manage the client's concerns while coordinating with her colleague David.

persons.name: David
persons.role: Attorney at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Colleague of Sigrid McCawley who is in the US Virgin Islands handling a hearing related to the Epstein estate. McCawley states she needs to confer with him regarding the client's FBI complaint.

persons.name: Attorney General Berman
persons.context: Mentioned by the FBI in relation to statements made by the client in emails, which the FBI discussed with Sigrid McCawley.

connections.description: Attorneys at the same law firm (Boies Schiller Flexner LLP). McCawley is trying to reach David to discuss a client's issue.
McCawley is the legal representative for a client who is upset and wants to file a complaint against the FBI.

events.title: Client threatens FBI complaint
events.description: An unnamed client emails attorney Sigrid McCawley expressing extreme frustration and intent to file an official complaint against the FBI for ignoring them and showing no respect.

events.title: FBI attempted call coordination
events.description: An FBI agent emailed the client to schedule a call for the afternoon of January 31, 2020, following up on previous coordination attempts.

events.title: Proposed FBI call
events.description: An FBI agent proposed a call with the client for January 22, 2020, to answer questions about the case together with the case agent.

events.title: Epstein estate hearing in USVI
events.description: Attorney David is in the US Virgin Islands for a hearing related to the Epstein estate issues.

locations: US Embassy (location unspecified, but provides a medical list)
keyFacts: A client of attorney Sigrid McCawley is attempting to file an official complaint against the FBI, citing being ignored and shown no respect.
The FBI had previously been in contact with the client, attempting to schedule calls in January 2020 to discuss the case.
Sigrid McCawley references that the FBI contacted her about emails from the client, which mentioned statements by Attorney General Berman.
A hearing related to the Epstein estate was taking place in the US Virgin Islands around February 3-4, 2020, handled by attorney David.
The email chain shows significant tension and communication breakdown between a victim/witness and their legal representation regarding engagement with law enforcement.
